item.title: Ukraine border guards to inspect Russian aid convoy - BBC News
item.description:
BBC News
Ukraine border guards to inspect Russian aid convoy
BBC News
Ukrainian border guards have arrived to inspect a controversial Russian aid convoy parked at the frontier. The convoy aims to bring aid to cities in eastern Ukraine held by pro-Russian rebels, although reporters said many of the lorries were largely empty.
